pages.text: The $(5)Speed Module$() can be placed in the upgrade slots of various MFFS machines to upgrade their performance. Its effects vary depending on the machine, but most commonly include: $(li)Speeding up force field projection$(li)Increasing the $(l:mffs:getting_started/fortron)Fortron$() transfer limit of a $(l:mffs:machines/fortron_capacitor)Fortron Capacitor$()$(li)Increasing the efficiency of a $(l:mffs:machines/coercion_deriver)Coercion Deriver$()
